attributes.action: To create more jobs for youth (age 16)
attributes.additional_details: We would want the Government to make more jobs as the youth needs to learn skills of working for the future but as of right now,there  isn’t much of a choice for jobs for the youth widening the jobs for the youth may help to create a baseline for the youth for there future,  the youth may want to work more and also help create skills for the future to set them for the future and create a path for the future.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to create more jobs for the youth to support the youth for skills that will be needed for the future.
